create.subtitle: Creates a new pull request for {{repositoryName}}

diff.notSupported: Diffs for pull request are not supported by the type of repository
diff.markReviewed: Mark file as reviewed. This is for convenience only. Marked files are collapsed by default.
diff.partialMoreDiffsAvailable: There are more diffs available and among them {{count}} comment.
diff.partialMoreDiffsAvailable_plural: There are more diffs available and among them {{count}} comments.
diff.noChangesets: No changesets found. The commits could have been removed.

scm-review-plugin.noRequests: No pull requests matching the selected criteria found

pullRequest.title: Title

validation.title: Title is required
validation.BRANCHES_NOT_DIFFER: No differences between source branch and target branch
validation.PR_ALREADY_EXISTS: The pull request with your selected source branch and target branch already exists

pullRequest.author: Author
pullRequest.noChangesets: No changesets found. The commits could have been removed.

details.targetDeleted: The target branch has been deleted!
details.ignoredMergeObstacles: Following rules were ignored on merging the pull request:

mergeFromAuthorNotAllowed.obstacle: You should not merge your own pull request.

mergeButton.conflictTabHint: Existing conflicts are shown in the tab 'Conflicts'.

deleteSourceBranch.help: Source branch will be deleted after successful merge

commitMessageHint.FAST_FORWARD_IF_POSSIBLE: This message will only be used, when fast forward is not possible.

mergeModal.mergeConflict: The branches could not be merged because there were merge conflicts. Please try a different merging strategy or resolve the conflicts manually.

help.REBASE: Executes a rebase before the merge. Commits on the source branch are directly applied to the target branch.
help.SQUASH: Squash all commits of source branch into one new commit --and merge into-- on top of the target branch
help.MERGE_COMMIT: Merge branches with new commit and custom commit message
help.FAST_FORWARD_IF_POSSIBLE: Try to merge branches using fast-forward without creating a new commit. If a fast forward is not possible, a normal merge commit will be created.

confirmAlert.title: Reject Pull Request
confirmAlert.message: Do you really want to reject this pull request?

overrideModal.title: Workflow Engine
overrideModal.addMessageText: Additionally to the merge message in the next step you should add a comment, why you want to performe the emergency merge:

pullRequests.forbidden: You do not have the permission to read pull requests!

contextModal.title: Original Context
contextModal.message: This is the original diff context at the time of comment creation

confirmDeleteAlert.title: Delete Comment
confirmDeleteAlert.message: Do you really want to delete the comment?

confirmDoneAlert.title: Mark as Done
confirmDoneAlert.message: Do you really want to mark this task as done?

confirmMakeTaskAlert.title: Create a Task from this Comment
confirmMakeTaskAlert.message: Do you really want to make this comment a task?

reopenAlert.title: Mark as NOT Done
reopenAlert.message: Do you really want to reopen this task?

makeCommentAlert.title: Make this a Normal Comment
makeCommentAlert.message: Do you really want to transform this task to a normal comment?

confirmCancelUpdateAlert.title: Cancel Update
confirmCancelUpdateAlert.message: Do you really want to reject the modifications on the comment?

systemMessage.merged: The pull request has been merged.
systemMessage.rejected: The pull request has been rejected.
systemMessage.sourceDeleted: The source branch of the pull request has been deleted.
systemMessage.emergencyMerged: The pull request has been merged with an emergency merge. The workflow engine rules has been ignored.

outdated.label: outdated
outdated.title: The comment is related to an older of the source or target branch
outdated.titleClickable: The comment is related to an older of the source or target branch. Click here to see the original context.

changeNotification.title: New Changes
changeNotification.description: The underlying pull request has changed. Press reload to see the changes.
changeNotification.modificationWarning: Warning: Unsaved modifications will be lost.

hint.text: Learn how to resolve the conflicts to merge this branch.

restrictBranchWriteAccess.label: Branch protection enabled
restrictBranchWriteAccess.helpText: Enables branch protection, so that branches are only modifiable with pull requests.

disableRepositoryConfiguration.label: Do not allow repository configuration
disableRepositoryConfiguration.helpText: Do not allow repository owners to configure pull requests.

branches.subtitle: Restrictions on Branches
branches.note: Branches matching the following patterns will only be writable by pull requests:

newBranch.label: Add branch pattern
newBranch.helpText: Add a new branch pattern to the list of protected branches.

add.label: Add
add.helpText: Add the given branch to the list of protected branches.

bypasses.subtitle: Exceptions from Restrictions
bypasses.note: Users or groups listed here will still be able to write to the branches above:

add.label: Add
add.helpText: Adds this user or group to the list of exceptions.

preventMergeFromAuthor.label: Prevent authors from merging own pull requests
preventMergeFromAuthor.helpText: Check this to prevent authors to merge pull requests created by them. This can be overridden with the emergency merge permission.

scm-review-plugin.obstacle: This branch can only be modified by pull requests.

todo.todoTitle: {{open}} of {{count}} tasks are not marked as done, yet
todo.title: #{{id}} {{title}}

enableEngine.label: Activate workflow engine
enableEngine.helpText: Activate the workflow engine and validate all pull requests by the defined rules.

newRule.label: Add new Rule
newRule.helpText: Adds a new rule to validate pull requests.

disableRepositoryConfiguration.label: Do not allow repository configuration
disableRepositoryConfiguration.helpText: Do not allow repository owners to configure the workflow engine.

search.invalidResult: Found invalid pull request search result

prChanged.label: New/changed pull requests
prChanged.helpText: Mails on new or changed of pull requests.

closed.label: Closing pull requests
closed.helpText: Mails when pull requests have been merged or finally rejected.

comments.label: New/changed comments
comments.helpText: Mails on new or changed comments in pull requests you have subscribed.

replies.label: Replies to comments
replies.helpText: Mails on replies to commments in pull requests you have subscribed.

approvals.label: Approvals
approvals.helpText: Mails when subscribed pull requests have been approved or approvals have been revoked.

mentions.label: Mentions
mentions.helpText: Mails when you have been mentioned in a comment.

prUpdated.label: Updated
prUpdated.helpText: Mails when pull requests have been updated.

*.description: May see all pull requests for all repositories
May create, comment and reject pull requests for all repositories
May configure pull requests for all repositories
May perform an emergency merge and ignore the configured workflow rules

workflowConfig.description: May configure workflow engine configuration for all repositories

commentPullRequest.description: May add comments to pull requests

modifyPullRequest.description: May modify the title, the description and the reviewers of the pull request itself and modify/delete comments from other users

mergePullRequest.description: May merge or reject pull requests (merge needs additional permission to push the repository)

configurePullRequest.description: May configure pull requests for this repository

readWorkflowConfig.description: May read the workflow engine configuration for this repository

writeWorkflowConfig.description: May configure the workflow engine configuration for this repository

performEmergencyMerge.description: May merge pull requests even though not all rules configured in the workflow are fulfilled

FTRhcI0To1.description: Merges can only be performed for open pull requests.

CVRj80D6z1.description: There are no differences between the selected branches, that could be merged (or the source branch is a parent of the target branch).

9nRnT3cjk1.description: The merge was prevented by other plugins.

FuRoChFWt1.displayName: Branch only writable with pull requests
FuRoChFWt1.description: The branch can only be changed by merging pull requests.

6nRxQptwH1.description: The format of the rule configuration is invalid.

AllReviewerApprovedRule.name: All reviewers approved
AllReviewerApprovedRule.description: All selected reviewers have approved the pull request.
AllReviewerApprovedRule.failed: Not all reviewers have approved this pull request.
AllReviewerApprovedRule.obstacle: Not all reviewers have approved this pull request.
AllReviewerApprovedRule.success: All reviewers approved this pull request.

AllTasksDoneRule.name: All tasks done
AllTasksDoneRule.description: All tasks of the pull requests are done.
AllTasksDoneRule.failed: {{count}} tasks for this pull request are open.
AllTasksDoneRule.obstacle: There are open tasks for this pull request.
AllTasksDoneRule.success: All tasks for this pull request are done.

ApprovedByXReviewersRule.name: Number of approvals
ApprovedByXReviewersRule.description: The pull request is approved by at least {{numberOfReviewers}} reviewers.
ApprovedByXReviewersRule.failed: {{missing}} approvals are missing ({{actual}}/{{expected}} reviewers approved this pull request).
ApprovedByXReviewersRule.obstacle: There are not enough approvals for this pull request.
ApprovedByXReviewersRule.success: There are enough approvals for this pull request.

numberOfReviewers.label: Minimum number of approvals
numberOfReviewers.helpText: Minimum number of reviewers that have to approve the pull request.
numberOfReviewers.errorMessage: The value must be greater than 0.

description.exampleValue: We added a new button which looks nice but does nothing at all.

status.hints: Pull request status like OPEN, MERGED, REJECTED

creationDate.hints: Timestamp of creation in ms since 01-01-1970. Range search possible.

closeDate.hints: Timestamp when the pull request was closed in ms since 01-01-1970. Range search possible.

lastModified.hints: Timestamp of last modification in ms since 01-01-1970. Range search possible.

overrideMessage.hints: Message why the pull request was emergency merged and ignored the workflow engine rules.
overrideMessage.exampleValue: The PROD system was on fire so we had to emergency merge our fix.

emergencyMerged.hints: Flag which shows if the pull request was emergency merged.

date.hints: Timestamp of last modification in ms since 01-01-1970. Range search possible.

author.hints: The username of the author. NOT the displayname!

systemComment.hints: Flag if the comment was automatically created

emergencyMerged.hints: Flag if the comment was created during an emergency merge

type.hints: Type of the comment like COMMENT, TASK_TODO or TASK_DONE
